channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-9178] Hanging tests from Jenkins build job since namespaces went in
item.description:
Below are list hanging tests from various build jobs(which aren't reported as failures).

From hbase-0.95 last three runs
======= 420 skipped(Or don't have) following tests =======
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.testadmin
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.testsecureloadincrementalhfilessplitrecovery
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.testsecureloadincrementalhfiles
======= 421 skipped(Or don't have) following tests =======
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.testsecureloadincrementalhfilessplitrecovery
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.testsecureloadincrementalhfiles
======= 422 skipped(Or don't have) following tests =======
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.testadmin
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.testsecureloadincrementalhfilessplitrecovery
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.testsecureloadincrementalhfiles

From hbase-0.95-on-hadoop2

======= 225 skipped(Or don't have) following tests =======
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.catalog.testmetamigrationconvertingtopb
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.testsecureloadincrementalhfilessplitrecovery
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.testsecureloadincrementalhfiles
======= 226 skipped(Or don't have) following tests =======
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.testadmin
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.catalog.testmetamigrationconvertingtopb
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.testsecureloadincrementalhfilessplitrecovery
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.testsecureloadincrementalhfiles
======= 227 skipped(Or don't have) following tests =======
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.testadmin
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.catalog.testmetamigrationconvertingtopb
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.testsecureloadincrementalhfilessplitrecovery
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.testsecureloadincrementalhfiles
item.summary: Hanging tests from Jenkins build job since namespaces went in

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Jeffrey Zhong Is this your fancy tool that is finding these?
This is great. Looks like its builds.apache.org
Yes, I updated the tool(hbase-8018). The results are from builds.apache.org and seems the result reported more than it's actually be. Let me update the result set. Thanks.
I am running these tests locally to see if can see hangs...

I updated the hang test list to avoid some test case name changing to skew the final result because only test suite hangs(either all test cases of it shows or none of a test suite has result). Thanks.
Your list now matches what I figured over in HBASE-8939 only I did it w/ grep, sort, compare.

It looks like TestSecureLoadIncrementalHFilesSplitRecovery fails with this:


  3 2013-08-09 14:14:46,445 WARN  [hbase-table-pool-59-thread-2] client.RpcRetryingCaller(122): Call exception, tries=27, retries=35, retryTime=-243099ms

  4 java.io.IOException: java.io.IOException: Illegal character <10> at 0. User-space table qualifiers can only contain 'alphanumeric characters': i.e. [a-zA-Z_0-9-.]:.

  5 ,...at sun.reflect.GeneratedConstructorAccessor17.newInstance(Unknown Source)

  6 ,...at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.java:27)

  7 ,...at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Constructor.java:513)

  8 ,...at org.apache.hadoop.ipc.RemoteException.instantiateException(RemoteException.java:95)

  9 ,...at org.apache.hadoop.ipc.RemoteException.unwrapRemoteException(RemoteException.java:79)

 10 ,...at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.protobuf.ProtobufUtil.getRemoteException(ProtobufUtil.java:234)

 11 ,...at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.protobuf.ProtobufUtil.execService(ProtobufUtil.java:1303)

 12 ,...at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.RegionCoprocessorRpcChannel$1.call(RegionCoprocessorRpcChannel.java:87)

 13 ,...at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.RegionCoprocessorRpcChannel$1.call(RegionCoprocessorRpcChannel.java:84)

 14 ,...at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RpcRetryingCaller.callWithRetries(RpcRetryingCaller.java:120)

 15 ,...at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RpcRetryingCaller.callWithRetries(RpcRetryingCaller.java:98)

 16 ,...at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.RegionCoprocessorRpcChannel.callExecService(RegionCoprocessorRpcChannel.java:90)

 17 ,...at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.CoprocessorRpcChannel.callMethod(CoprocessorRpcChannel.java:51)

 18 ,...at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.protobuf.generated.SecureBulkLoadProtos$SecureBulkLoadService$Stub.prepareBulkLoad(SecureBulkLoadProtos.java:3819)

 19 ,...at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.coprocessor.SecureBulkLoadClient$1.call(SecureBulkLoadClient.java:68)

 20 ,...at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.coprocessor.SecureBulkLoadClient$1.call(SecureBulkLoadClient.java:56)

 21 ,...at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.HTable$18.call(HTable.java:1578)

 22 ,...at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(FutureTask.java:303)

 23 ,...at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:138)

 24 ,...at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:895)

 25 ,...at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:918)

 26 ,...at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:680)

It just keeps retrying. Let me add timeouts and try and fix this issue.

Your list now matches what I figured over in HBASE-8939 only I did it w/ grep, sort, compare.

Yeah, I think your script is better. I thought we don't have a good way to detect those hang tests. Thanks.
